description:
math/big: fix big.Exp and document better

- always return 1 for y <= 0
- document that the sign of m is ignored
- protect against div-0 panics by treating
  m == 0 the same way as m == nil
- added extra tests

Fixes issue 4239.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=24401c14a1a9 ***

math/big: fix big.Exp and document better

- always return 1 for y <= 0
- document that the sign of m is ignored
- protect against div-0 panics by treating
  m == 0 the same way as m == nil
- added extra tests

Fixes issue 4239.

R=agl, remyoudompheng, agl
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6724046

Hello agl@chromium.org, remyoudompheng@gmail.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

subject: code review 6724046: math/big: fix big.Exp and document better
